statements: SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consultation_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, date_time FROM consultations ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT consultation_id, diagnosis FROM consultations WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id FROM consultations ORDER BY patient_id ASC, consultation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT diagnosis, patient_id FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 201 AND diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_consultations FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 301;
SELECT consultation_id, date_time FROM consultations WHERE patient_id = 102 AND doctor_id = 202 ORDER BY date_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT distinct doctor_id FROM consultations ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_notes FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 101 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT p.patient_name, a.appointment_date FROM patients p INNER JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM age(date_of_birth)) > 40;
SELECT * FROM consultations;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM consultations WHERE diagnosis='Flu';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, patient_id, doctor_id FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE consultation_id=1;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status='Scheduled' AND patient_id=3;
SELECT consultation_id, patient_id, doctor_id, diagnosis FROM consultations WHERE doctor_id = 12345;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, start_time, end_time FROM consultations WHERE end_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, consultation_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM appointments GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY appointment_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_consultations;
SELECT patient_id, consultation_date, consultation_notes FROM patient_consultations WHERE consultation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, prescription_text FROM prescriptions WHERE doctor_id = 12345;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_consultations WHERE consultation_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) FROM patient_consultations GROUP BY doctor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT p.patient_name, c.consultation_date, a.appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN patient_consultations c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_text LIKE '%pain%' OR prescription_text LIKE '%fever%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty LIKE '%Surgery%';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors WHERE doctor_specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, prescription_details FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.prescription_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT consultation_id, patient_name, doctor_name, consultation_date FROM consultations JOIN patients ON consultations.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON consultations.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE consultation_date < '2022-03-10' ORDER BY consultation_date DESC;
